farmcity.controller

Class ManageLoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • farmcity.controller.ManageLoginController

  • public class ManageLoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the register, login, logout functions for the player

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ManageLoginController()
      This constructor initializes playerDAO and plotDAO

    • Constructor Detail

      • ManageLoginController

        public ManageLoginController()
                      throws CityException,
                             java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This constructor initializes playerDAO and plotDAO
        Throws:
        CityException - if the DAO cannot be initialized
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the necessary files to initialise the application cannot be found

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public boolean register(java.lang.String username,
                        java.lang.String fullName,
                        java.lang.String password,
                        java.lang.String confirmedPassword)
                 throws CityException
        This method allows unregistered user to register a new account to play Farm City
        Parameters:
        username - The username that user wishes to have in game. Only allows alphanumeric characters. Cannot be changed.
        fullName - Full name of the user, only displayed to the user himself/ herself. Cannot be changed.
        password - Password for login authentication. Only allows alphanumeric characters. Cannot be changed.
        confirmedPassword - To confirm that this is the password user wants to set for his/her account
        Returns:
        return true if the user succeeded in creating a new account, return false otherwise (player already exists, confirm password string doesn't match with password
        Throws:
        CityException - if the necessary files to initialise the application cannot be found OR there is a password mismatch OR the player's username has already been registered OR the input String by the user does not only contain alphanumeric characters

      • stringValidation

        public boolean stringValidation(java.lang.String validateString)

      • fullNameValidation

        public boolean fullNameValidation(java.lang.String validateString)

      • login

        public Player login(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
             throws CityException
        This method allows a registered player to login to his account using the chosen username and password.
        Parameters:
        username - The player's chosen username
        password - The player's chosen password
        Returns:
        the Player object which corresponds to the given username and password
        Throws:
        CityException - If the file(s) cannot be found at the specified directory OR if invalid user credentials have been entered

      • logout

        public boolean logout(Player player)
               throws CityException
        This method allows the player to save his current progress in game and logout of the game when he/she no longer wishes to play or are forced to sleep by his/her parents
        Parameters:
        player - The Player object which corresponds to the player's account
        Returns:
        return true when player succeeded in logging out of the game, return false otherwise
        Throws:
        CityException - if the file(s) cannot be found at the specified directory
